tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(50),
    event_date TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR(20),
    source_ip VARCHAR(15),
    destination_ip VARCHAR(15),
    event_description TEXT
);
CREATE TABLE threat_events ( event_id INT PRIMARY KEY, event_name VARCHAR(255), event_type VARCHAR(255), event_timestamp TIMESTAMP, event_description TEXT )
CREATE TABLE security_logs ( log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, log_timestamp TIMESTAMP, log_source VARCHAR(255), log_message TEXT )

CREATE TABLE SIEM_Alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_time TIMESTAMP,
    alert_description TEXT,
    event_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES SIEM_Events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SIEM_Incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    incident_time TIMESTAMP,
    incident_description TEXT,
    alert_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (alert_id) REFERENCES SIEM_Alerts(alert_id)
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    severity VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    severity VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
    email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(100),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_type VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    data JSON
)
